title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.35 - Photographs and cinematic productions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.35 - Photographs and cinematic productions

State Regulations

No person shall take any photograph or engage in any
cinematic production for commercial purposes in any park, including any park
street, without a permit. The permit holder shall be responsible to restore any
park property altered or damaged in connection with the exercise of such
permit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
